# History

## 0.1.0 (2018-04-04)

* First release on PyPI.

## 0.2.0 (2019-07-13)

* Main refactoring of the package.

## 0.2.1 (2019-11-03)

* Improved testing and continuous integration.
* Fixed minor bugs and issues.

## 0.2.2 (2019-11-03)

* Improved support for reward shaping.
* Fixed minor bugs and issues.
